ComicInfo.Title: Siren's Song
ComicInfo.Summary:
SIREN'S SONG! The G.I. JOE team goes toe-to-toe with COBRA's newest agent! SIREN knows all of COBRA's secrets-and with the eyes of the world on DUKE and the squad, how will they break her spell?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Steve Kurth (p), Allen Martinez (i) & Joana LaFuente (c) | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Freddie E. Williams II (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 11:53:41. [CVDB448021]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allen Martinez, David Garcia Cruz, Freddie E. Williams II, Joana Lafuente, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Big Boa, COBRA Viper, Cover Girl, Duke, Hashtag, Isaac Craft, Roadblock, Shipwreck, Siren, Tunnel Rat
ComicInfo.Teams: COBRA, G.I. Joe, United States Army, Vipers
ComicInfo.Locations: Africa, New York City, North America
